short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extention that works with PatientScore.io to help eveluate the success of patient outcomes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The chrome extension was made to be used to communicated with patients regarding their attendance and upcoming appointments. Used in conjunction with patientscore.io the extension help providers in the healthcare space create better outcome based decision making in the patient care journey. The extension also helps providers cut down on cancellation and no show rate with patients greatly helping their clinics prosper.
